info.name: WorkLink API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for WorkLink platform with authentication, user registration, and protected routes testing.

## Features:
- Automatic JWT token management
- Pre-configured test data
- Response validation scripts
- Environment variables for easy testing

## Quick Start:
1. Import this collection
2. Run requests in Authentication folder
3. Tokens are saved automatically
4. Test protected routes

## Base URL: http://localhost:8080

request.description:
Register a new freelancer account.

**Required Fields:**
- firstName, lastName
- email (must be unique)
- password (minimum 8 characters)
- gender (MALE, FEMALE, OTHER)
- dateOfBirth (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- phoneNumber (E.164 format)
- yearsOfExperience
- profileTypes (array)
- tjm (daily rate)
- languages (array)

**Response:** JWT token + user details

item.name: 4. Reference - Enum Values

request.description:
# Enum Values Reference

This is a reference document showing all valid enum values for registration requests.

## Gender
- MALE
- FEMALE
- OTHER

## Profile Types (Freelancers)
- BI_DATA
- BUSINESS_CONSULTING
- ERP_CRM
- INDUSTRIAL_IT_ELECTRONICS
- NEW_TECHNOLOGIES
- OFFICE_SUPPORT
- TESTING_QUALITY
- SYSTEM_RESOURCES
- STUDIES_DEVELOPMENT
- SYSTEMS_INFRASTRUCTURE
- OTHER

## Languages
- FRENCH
- ENGLISH
- ARABIC
- SPANISH
- GERMAN
- ITALIAN
- PORTUGUESE
- CHINESE
- JAPANESE
- OTHER

## Legal Forms (Companies)
- SARL (Soci√©t√© √† Responsabilit√© Limit√©e)
- SAS (Soci√©t√© par Actions Simplifi√©e)
- PAS (Soci√©t√© en Participation)
- SUARL (Soci√©t√© Unipersonnelle √† Responsabilit√© Limit√©e)
- OTHER

## Date Format
- All dates must be in format: **YYYY-MM-DD**
- Example: "1995-05-15"

## Phone Number Format
- International format recommended: **+216XXXXXXXX**
- Must be 8-15 digits
- Can include + prefix

## Password Requirements
- Minimum 8 characters
- Recommended: Mix of letters, numbers, and special characters
